price: (51) And the Horn will be blown;[1274] and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَنسِلُونَ
footnotes: [1274]- For the second time, signaling the Resurrection.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fa-idhā hum mina al-ajdāthi ilā rabbihim yansilūna
